channel.title: Wave Chaser - Arimyth [Electronic x Synthwave fusion] :arimyth:
channel.description:
Been working on this one for a while and am super psyched to have it out to share with y'all. Definitely went for a fusion vibe on this one, specifically with my original electronic / house style and my current synthwave inspired aesthetic. Hope you enjoy this one!
https://soundcloud.com/arimyth/wave-chaser
![wavechaser|500x500](upload://61ChP4dxFh49JPjFDJy25Chy2X9.jpeg)
Definitely want to give a shout out to @TC64 for consistently giving high quality feedback through my numerous iterations of this track. :slight_smile:

item.title: Wave Chaser - Arimyth [Electronic x Synthwave fusion] :arimyth:
item.dc:creator: tom_heck
item.description:
Chords are a nice start. The arp sound is a bit funky at the beginning, but once it gets its gate I appreciate what you did with it a lot more. Snare doesn’t fit in the drop in my opinion. Really starting to like this arp now. Okay yep this is a bop. I expect nothing less from you good sir. Oooh that chord change. It sounds a bit funky but it’s not BAD. It’s definitely a good switch up in the chords. Yeah I like this a lot now. The triplets omg beautiful.

Complexity: 8/10
Quality: 8/10
Interest: 7/10
Use Of Instruments: 6/10 (Didn’t like some of the chosen instruments)
Drum Pattern: 8/10 (Just that snare lol)

Overall: 37/50

Read full topic

item.title: Wave Chaser - Arimyth [Electronic x Synthwave fusion] :arimyth:
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Brilliantly done. Love the art. A great take on wave + regular good old electronic. Drums on point, sample selection is great. Art on point. Through the 2:00-2:30 section I love how you resolved the chord progression. Was not expected.

Overall, awesome. Looking forward to the next

Read full topic
item.source: Wave Chaser - Arimyth [Electronic x Synthwave fusion] :arimyth:
